bike.description: 6011 hydroformed butted aluminum mainframe & stays, cold-forged dropouts, G2 29" Geometry, top swing magnesium link, E2, ABP

components.description: Bontrager Rhythm Elite 29 Disc, tubeless ready
Bontrager XDX 29x2.1, 120 TPI, aramid bead, tubeless ready
Bontrager Race Lite, superlight hollow cromoly rails
Bontrager Race Lite, 2014 aluminum shaft, infinite adjust Bontrager head
Bontrager Race Lite Bigger Sweep, 690mm width, 17d backsweep, OS
Bontrager Race X Lite OS, 7d rise, 31.8mm clamp
FSA 57 Orbits, E2 1-1/8"-1-1/2", semi-integrated, cartridge bearings
Avid Elixir R hydraulic disc, 185mm front/ 160mm rear rotors
Sag gauges for rear shock and front fork / shock pump
